notes
property.value:
Master of Empire

This is a Napoleonic Wars alternate history game pitting the Western Powers against the Eastern Powers.

This game is a variation on the original Napoleonic Wars campaign by LSSAH & Verqry.

property.name: Units Can Be Destroyed Instead Of Captured
Battleships repair at beginning of round
Shore Bombard Per Ground Unit Restricted
Naval Bombard Casualties Return Fire Restricted
